Name: Pirate Island Rescue
About the game: Swing your cutlass, shoot your pistol, and throw your bombs to clear your path of enemy pirates as you run and jump your way across each island to rescue the captives from the clutches of dastardly Captain Black Beard. Pirate Island Rescue is a 2D action platform adventure with procedurally generated levels, giving you a new challenge each time you play. Speedrun the levels or collect as much treasure as you can to make it to the top of the leaderboards.
